plot outline: This project's aim is to submit the Malayalam feature film 'ASHIQ VANNA DIVASAM', to all popular and important festivals in 2018. This movie has completed its production in 2017 and successfully screened by the Central Board of Film Certification of India at Trivandrum. This movie would like to convey a very good sensational message to this world of humanity.
title: Aashiq Vanna Divasam
akas: The Day Aashiq Came (India, English title)
plot: Shyni and her two children are waiting for the arrival of her husband Aashiq who is working in Bahrain. The family's anxiety is aggravated when they learn that Aashiq voluntarily opts for working in Afghanistan.

This project's aim is to submit the Malayalam feature film 'ASHIQ VANNA DIVASAM', to all popular and important festivals in 2018. This movie has completed its production in 2017 and successfully screened by the Central Board of Film Certification of India at Trivandrum. This movie would like to convey a very good sensational message to this world of humanity.
